SEARCH

Class Image

java.lang.Object
Image
public class Image extends Object
An image that can be moved, resized, and that draws itself on a canvas.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Image(String filename)
    Create an image with a default position and size.
    Image(String filename, int width, int height)
    Create an image with a specified position and size.
    Image(String filename, int x, int y, boolean visible)
    Create an image with a specified position and a default size.
    Image(String filename, int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean visible)
    Create an image with a specified position and size.

  • Constructor Details

    • Image

      public Image(String filename)
      Create an image with a default position and size.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the image file to load

    • Image

      public Image(String filename, int width, int height)
      Create an image with a specified position and size. Width OR height can be -1 to scale the image to the correct aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the image file to load
      width - the width of the image
      height - the height of the image

    • Image

      public Image(String filename, int x, int y, boolean visible)
      Create an image with a specified position and a default size.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the image file to load
      x - the x position of the image
      y - the y position of the image
      visible - whether the image should be visible

    • Image

      public Image(String filename, int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean visible)
      Create an image with a specified position and size. Width OR height can be -1 to scale the image to the correct aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the image file to load
      x - the x position of the image
      y - the y position of the image
      width - the width of the image
      height - the height of the image
      visible - whether the image should be visible

  • Method Details

    • setX

      public void setX(int x)
      Set the X position of the image.
      Parameters:
      x - the new X position

    • setY

      public void setY(int y)
      Set the Y position of the image.
      Parameters:
      y - the new Y position

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int x, int y)
      Set the position of the image.
      Parameters:
      x - the new x position
      y - the new y position

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Get the X position of the image.
      Returns:
      the X position of the image

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Get the Y position of the image.
      Returns:
      the Y position of the image

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Get the width of the image.
      Returns:
      the width of the image

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Get the height of the image.
      Returns:
      the height of the image

    • setWidth

      public void setWidth(int width)
      Set the width of the image. The image will be scaled maintaining the aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      width - the new width

    • setHeight

      public void setHeight(int height)
      Set the height of the image. The image will be scaled maintaining the aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      height - the new height

    • setSize

      public void setSize(int width, int height)
      Set the size of the image. Width OR height can be -1 to scale the image to the correct aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      width - the new width
      height - the new height

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make this image visible. If it is already visible, do nothing.

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      Make this image invisible. If it is already invisible, do nothing.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Determine if the image is visible. Returns true if the image is visible, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the image is visible, false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int x, int y)
      Determine if a point is inside the image.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the point
      y - the y coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point is inside the image, false otherwise
